verses.verse: The Mighty <S%H410><s%> One, <S%H430><s%> God, Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> speaks, <S%H1696><s%> and calls <S%H7121><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> from <S%H8121><s%> sunrise <S%H4217><s%> to sunset. <S%H3996><s%>
Out of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> the perfection <S%H4359><s%> of beauty, <S%H3308><s%> God <S%H430><s%> shines forth. <S%H3313><s%>

Our God <S%H430><s%> comes, <S%H935><s%> and does not keep silent. <S%H2790><s%> A fire <S%H784><s%> devours <S%H398><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him. <S%H3966><s%> It is very stormy <S%H8175><s%> around him. <S%H5439><s%>
He calls <S%H7121><s%> to the heavens <S%H8064><s%> above, <S%H5920><s%> to the earth, <S%H776><s%> that he may judge <S%H1777><s%> his people: <S%H5971><s%>
"Gather <S%H622><s%> my saints <S%H2623><s%> together to me, <S%H3772><s%> those who have made a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with me by sacrifice. <S%H2077><s%>"
The heavens <S%H8064><s%> shall declare <S%H5046><s%> his righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> for God <S%H430><s%> himself is judge. <S%H8199><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
"Hear, <S%H8085><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> and I will speak; <S%H1696><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and I will testify <S%H1696><s%> against you. <S%H430><s%> I am God, your God. <S%H430><s%>
I don't <S%H3198><s%> rebuke you for your sacrifices. <S%H2077><s%> Your burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> are continually before me. <S%H8548><s%>
I have no need <S%H3947><s%> for a bull <S%H6499><s%> from your stall, <S%H1004><s%> nor male goats <S%H6260><s%> from your pens. <S%H4356><s%>
For every animal <S%H2416><s%> of the forest <S%H3293><s%> is mine, <S%H929><s%> and the livestock on a thousand <S%H505><s%> hills. <S%H2042><s%>
I know <S%H3045><s%> all the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the mountains. <S%H2022><s%> The wild animals <S%H2123><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> are mine. <S%H5978><s%>
If I were hungry, <S%H7456><s%> I would not tell <S%H559><s%> you, <S%H8398><s%> for the world is mine, <S%H4393><s%> and all that is in it.
Will I eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of bulls, <S%H47><s%> or drink <S%H8354><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of goats? <S%H6260><s%>
Offer <S%H2076><s%> to God <S%H430><s%> the sacrifice of thanksgiving. <S%H8426><s%> Pay <S%H7999><s%> your vows <S%H5088><s%> to the Most High. <S%H5945><s%>
Call <S%H7121><s%> on me in the day <S%H3117><s%> of trouble. <S%H6869><s%> I will deliver <S%H2502><s%> you, <S%H3513><s%> and you will honor me."

But to the wicked <S%H7563><s%> God <S%H430><s%> says, <S%H559><s%> "What right do you have to declare <S%H5608><s%> my statutes, <S%H2706><s%> that you have taken <S%H5375><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> on your lips, <S%H6310><s%>
since you hate <S%H8130><s%> instruction, <S%H4148><s%> and throw <S%H7993><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%> behind you? <S%H310><s%>
When you saw <S%H7200><s%> a thief, <S%H1590><s%> you consented <S%H7521><s%> with him, <S%H2506><s%> and have participated with adulterers. <S%H5003><s%>
"You give <S%H7971><s%> your mouth <S%H6310><s%> to evil. <S%H7451><s%> Your tongue <S%H3956><s%> frames <S%H6775><s%> deceit. <S%H4820><s%>
You sit <S%H3427><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> against your brother. <S%H251><s%> You <S%H5414><s%> slander <S%H1848><s%> your own mother <S%H517><s%>'s son. <S%H1121><s%>

You have done <S%H6213><s%> these things, <S%H2790><s%> and I kept silent. You thought <S%H1819><s%> that I was just <S%H1961><s%> like you. <S%H3198><s%> I will rebuke you, <S%H6186><s%> and accuse you in front of your eyes. <S%H5869><s%>
"Now consider <S%H995><s%> this, <S%H7911><s%> you who forget God, <S%H433><s%> lest I tear you into pieces, <S%H2963><s%> and there be none to deliver. <S%H5337><s%>

Whoever offers <S%H2076><s%> the sacrifice of thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%> glorifies <S%H3513><s%> me, <S%H7760><s%> and prepares his way <S%H1870><s%> so that I will show <S%H7200><s%> God <S%H430><s%>'s salvation to him. <S%H3468><s%>"
